snippet: Hassan Sheik Mohamud will head a fledgling government that replaces the internationally backed transitional administration that had been trying to get Somalia on its feet.
abstract: Members of Somalia's newly created Parliament elect moderate political activist and academic Hassan Sheik Mohamud as the country's next president; Mohamud's election is heralded as a significant step forward for a country that has endured more than two decades of war and political instability.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Sheik Mohamud will head a fledgling government that replaces the internationally backed transitional administration that had been trying to get Somalia on its feet.

headline.seo: Parliament Selects Mohamud as Somalia’s President
headline.main: Somalia Selects an Activist as Leader
headline.print_headline: Somalia Selects An Activist As Leader
